scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w packages/server" "npm run dev -w packages/client"
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/server/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/client/tsconfig.json
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/server && npm run build -w packages/client
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build
